snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Tuesday's selection includes surging interest in online casino games as a result of the Justice Department's new take on online gambling, a...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Tuesday's selection includes surging interest in online casino games as a result of the Justice Department's new take on online gambling, a look at Facebook's organ donor status updates and Kickstarter projects that didn't do so well.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Apple Security and Kickstarter Flops
